page.title: 17Holbeach Bank School Events.
page.content: The first day I went to Holbeach Bank School it was 5th November and there was a bonfire party that night. About 100 people went. There was a bonfire in a big oil drum in the middle of the playground. Lots of people brought fireworks and it took all evening to let them off. There was a barbecue where people were cooking sausages and beefburgers. Inside you could buy soup, jacket potatoes and drinks. The spring fair at school was held in May. It was opened by Emma Neve who was the May Queen. After that there was Maypole dancing by the children. Emma was presented with a bouquet by the youngest child in the school, Allison Hyde. After the dancing there were toys and books and household items for sale. There were games to play and refreshments to eat. The money was used to buy P.E. equipment.
